title: Life on Air: David Attenborough's 50 Years in Television

sources.title: 06 Life On Air ( 2002)
sources.description: This documentary traces the extraordinary television career of the legendary naturalist Sir David Attenborough, a BBC staple and one of the most respected pioneers of the nature documentary.

metadata.Plot: This documentary traces the extraordinary television career of the legendary naturalist Sir David Attenborough, a BBC staple and one of the most respected pioneers of the nature documentary.
metadata.Actors: Michael Palin, David Attenborough, Richard Attenborough
